mapper.select: select emp.empno, emp.ename, dept.deptname, position.positionname, acc_status.statuscode from emp join dept on emp.deptcode = dept.deptcode join position on emp.positioncode = position.positioncode join acc_status on emp.statuscode = acc_status.statuscode where empno = #{empno}

select d.docno, d.writedate, d.title, d.total_Approval, d.curr_Approval, d.statusCode, d.typeCode , ds.statusname,dt.typename,e.ename,d.empno from document d join doc_status ds join doc_type dt join emp e on d.statuscode = ds.statuscode and d.typecode = dt.typecode and d.empno=e.empno where d.empno = #{empno}

select a.app_Order,a.app_Check, a.app_Date,a.comment, d.total_Approval, d.curr_Approval, d.title, d.writedate ,e.ename,dep.deptname,p.positionname,e.empno from document d join approver a join emp e join dept dep join position p on d.docno=a.docno and a.empno = e.empno and e.deptCode = dep.deptCode and e.positioncode = p.positioncode where d.docno = #{docNo} order by app_Order asc

select.if: select d.docno, d.writedate,d.empno, d.title, d.total_Approval, d.content, d.curr_Approval, d.statusCode, d.typeCode, ds.statusname,dt.typename,e.ename, from document d join doc_status ds join doc_type dt join emp e on d.statuscode = ds.statuscode and d.typecode = dt.typecode and d.empno=e.empno where d.docno = ${param1}

select d.docno,d.empno, d.writedate, d.title, d.total_Approval, d.content, d.curr_Approval, d.statusCode, d.typeCode, ds.statusname,dt.typename,e.ename,da.startdate,da.enddate from document d join doc_status ds join doc_type dt join emp e join doc_add da on d.statuscode = ds.statuscode and d.typecode = dt.typecode and d.empno=e.empno and da.document_docno=d.docno where d.docno = ${param1}

mapper.select:
select a.docno, a.app_order, a.app_date, a.comment, a.app_check,d.title,e.ename,d.writedate,d.statusCode,d.curr_Approval from approver a join document d join emp e on a.docno=d.docno and e.empno=d.empno
where a.empno = ${param2}
and ifnull(a.app_check,0)= 0 and (a.app_order-d.curr_Approval)=1
and ifnull(a.app_check,0)=1 and (d.total_Approval > d.curr_Approval)
and (d.total_Approval = d.curr_Approval)
and d.statusCode = 40
